translations.chinese: 徙燕王韓 廣為遼東王。
translations.english: Moved King of Yan Han Guang to King of Liaodong.
Yan general Zang Tu as King of Yan, capital at Ji.
Moved King of Qi Tian Shi to King of Jiaodong.

translations.chinese: 齊將田都為齊王，都臨菑。
translations.english: Qi general Tian Du as King of Qi, capital at Linzi.
Moved King of Zhao Xie to King of Dai.
